thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: Karen
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text: This was the first time I have been to home zone.. I walk in, and it was a little busy, but was greeted and asked if I needed any help with anything or have questions. I told him what I was looking for and if there was any kind of specials. He did give details and even showed me an example of the price and what came with it. As I went and looked around for a sofa and loveseat set, I was greeted by others and they asked if I needed help in finding something. Other places are not this friendly , and very happy that I chose homezone for my new furniture..You guys are amazing!!!
